actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

official_title: To provide for the protection of natural and cultural resources, Tribal collaborative management, sustainable economic development, enhanced recreation, and equitable access on Federal lands in eastern Imperial and Riverside counties, California, and for other purposes.
short_title: Chuckwalla National Monument Establishment and Joshua Tree National Park Expansion Act of 2023

titles.title: Chuckwalla National Monument Establishment and Joshua Tree National Park Expansion Act of 2023
Chuckwalla National Monument Establishment and Joshua Tree National Park Expansion Act of 2023

To provide for the protection of natural and cultural resources, Tribal collaborative management, sustainable economic development, enhanced recreation, and equitable access on Federal lands in eastern Imperial and Riverside counties, California, and for other purposes.
